mapper.insert: insert into HYDR_WATER_LEVEL_MONTH (ID, SECTION_ID, WATER_LEVEL_AVG, WATER_LEVEL_MAX, WATER_LEVEL_MAX_DATE, WATER_LEVEL_MIN, WATER_LEVEL_MIN_DATE, YEAR_ID, MONTH, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, MONITOR_TIME, YEAR) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waterLevelAvg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{waterLevelMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{waterLevelMaxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{waterLevelMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{waterLevelMinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yearId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{year,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
